com.viaoa.jfc.editor.html.control

Class FileImageHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.jfc.editor.html.control.FileImageHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageHandlerInterface

    public class FileImageHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ImageHandlerInterface
    Used by OAHTMLTextPane for manage file images. Note: this is not needed, as the OAHTMLTextPane will perform this same functionality by default.
    Author:
    vvia
